title: Bryant 2 & Pro
content:
Current URL: [http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232434/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html")

Bryant 2 & Pro  
Designed by [Eric Olson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232434/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eric%20Olson) 2002–2005

Bryant 2 and Bryant 2 Pro are the completely re-drawn and updated versions of our original [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232434/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bryant) series released in 2002. Initially a simple family of four fonts modeled around the popular Wrico lettering kits used by draftsmen and amateur sign makers in the 1960s and ’70s, Bryant 2 & Pro is now an expansive family of fonts for anything from worldwide branding projects to simple one-off posters.
author: AndrewSipe
